confirmation.sure: Are you sure you want to close this quiz? You will lose your progress.

landing.legal: legal status (such as Canadian citizen, Indian Status, or permanent resident)

meta.description: Not sure you've checked all the boxes to retire? Take this quiz as a first step towards your retirement checklist.

landing.p1: Not sure you've checked all the boxes to retire? Take this quiz as a first step towards your retirement checklist.
landing.p2: Your answers will help identify government pensions and benefits you could receive. They will also guide you on what to consider to better prepare for retirement.
landing.p3: You don't need any special information to take this quiz. To create the most appropriate retirement checklist, you will need to provide information on the following:
landing.residence: residence history (number of years lived in Canada)
landing.retirement: retirement plan (when you plan on retiring, where you plan on living in retirement, etc.)

question-marital-status.title: Select all that apply to you. You are...

question-earn.subtitle: Some people choose to work or earn money in retirement. This can affect your monthly pension amounts.
question-earn.title: Do you plan to earn money while collecting public pensions?

question-feel.subtitle: Do you feel confident that you have enough money to support your lifestyle and future plans in retirement?
question-feel.title: How financially prepared do you feel for retirement?

question-how-long.title: From age 18, how many years will you have lived in Canada when you apply for public pensions?

question-status.option-status-first-nation: MÃ©tis, Inuit, or member of First Nation
question-status.option-status-sponsored: Sponsored resident (less than 10 years in Canada)
question-status.title: When you retire, what will your legal status be in Canada?

question-when.title: When do you plan on retiring?

question-where.option-canada-pt-60-or-more: In Canada more than 6 months a year
question-where.option-canada-pt-less-than-60: In Canada less than 6 months a year
question-where.title: Where do you plan on living when you retire?
